name: CreateWebset
description:
Create a new Webset with optional configurations.

This tool creates a new Webset with optional search, import, and enrichment configurations. The Webset processing starts automatically once it's created. You can specify an `externalId` for easier integration with your own identifiers.

parameters.name: webset_configuration
parameters.description: A JSON object detailing optional search, import, and enrichment configurations for the Webset. Include any necessary identifiers like `externalId`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the exa API.
